column1: CaptainMutant,"2020-05-14T11:42:35.663Z","Building the Easter Bunny - Set 40398","
When it came time to order the exclusive sets that can normally only be purchased from the LEGO House in Billund, a promo code became available which allowed you to get a free polybag.
My hunch is that this polybag was a random one, and I ended up with set 30498, the Easter Bunny.

column2: d expect from a polybag, the build is simple and there are no complicated steps. The 43 pieces all slot in easily, and the end result is something that definitely looks like a rabbit - even its ears can move somewhat.

column2: s a little patch of dirt with a few juicy carrots sticking out of it.
